# automaticSize

**Type Property**

A placeholder size for self-sizing cells.

## Declaration

```swift
class let automaticSize: CGSize
```

## Discussion

Set this constant as the value for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewFlowLayout/estimatedItemSize] property to enable self-sizing cells for your collection view. This is a non-zero, placeholder value that tells the collection view to query each cell for its actual size using the cell’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionReusableView/preferredLayoutAttributesFitting(_:)] method.

## Configuring item spacing

- **minimumLineSpacing**: The minimum spacing to use between lines of items in the grid.
- **minimumInteritemSpacing**: The minimum spacing to use between items in the same row.
- **itemSize**: The default size to use for cells.
- **estimatedItemSize**: The estimated size of cells in the collection view.
- **sectionInset**: The margins used to lay out content in a section.
- **sectionInsetReference**: The boundary that section insets are defined in relation to.
- **UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference**: Constants that describe the reference point of the section insets.
